bibl.title: ""Altar’"" iz hrama Amona v oazise Baharija s egipetskoj carskoj titulaturoj Aleksandra Velikogo. I. Nadpisi pamjatnika. [The Altar from the Temple of Amun at the Bahariya Oasis with the Egyptian Royal Names of Alexander the Great. I. Inscriptions of the Monument.]
bibl.note: Considers an artifact (a kind of altar-shaped stela) which was found at the temple of Amun in the Bahariya Oasis by Ahmed Fakhry (during the excavations of 1930s) and recently published by Francisco Bosch-Puche [L'""autel"" du temple d'Alexandre le Grand à Bahariya retrouvé, BIFAO 108 (2008) pp. 29-44, 2 figg., 4 pll. (= S.E.G. LIX, 1764)]. Presents a translation and a commentary of the hieroglyphic inscription with the unique Pharaonic name of Alexander the Great including all the five traditional titles and a translation of the Greek inscription on the artifact. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ivan A. Ladynin, ""Altar’"" iz hrama Amona v oazise Baharija s egipetskoj carskoj titulaturoj Aleksandra Velikogo. I. Nadpisi pamjatnika. [The Altar from the Temple of Amun at the Bahariya Oasis with the Egyptian Royal Names of Alexander the Great. I. Inscriptions of the Monument.]

Considers an artifact (a kind of altar-shaped stela) which was found at the temple of Amun in the Bahariya Oasis by Ahmed Fakhry (during the excavations of 1930s) and recently published by Francisco Bosch-Puche [L'""autel"" du temple d'Alexandre le Grand à Bahariya retrouvé, BIFAO 108 (2008) pp. 29-44, 2 figg., 4 pll. (= S.E.G. LIX, 1764)]. Presents a translation and a commentary of the hieroglyphic inscription with the unique Pharaonic name of Alexander the Great including all the five traditional titles and a translation of the Greek inscription on the artifact. - Avec résumé en anglais.
